amendment.description: To strike the provision to defund Planned Parenthood.

action.text: Amendment SA 2771 ruled out of order by the chair.

Motion to waive section 302(f) of the Congressional Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2771, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 344.
Point of order that the amendment violates to section 302(f) of the Congressional Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2771.
Amendment SA 2771 proposed by Senator Murray to Amendment SA 2360.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2771 proposed by Senator Murray to Amendment SA 2360.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive section 302(f) of the Congressional Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2771, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 51. Record Vote Number: 344.
